name: CLSScoreItem
desc: Activity information that signifies a score out of a possible maximum.

items.name: init(identifier: String, title: String, score: Double, maxScore: Double)
items.desc: Initializes an activity item that holds a score value.

items.name: var score: Double
items.desc: The score earned by a user in completing the task.

items.name: var maxScore: Double
items.desc: The maximum possible score that the user can earn on a given task.
